original_text: Then you shall declare before the Lord your God: “My father was a wandering Aramean, and he went down into Egypt with a few people and lived there and became a great nation, powerful and numerous.
korean_text: 너는 또 네 하나님 여호와 앞에 아뢰기를 내 조상은 방랑하는 아람 사람으로서 애굽에 내려가 거기에서 소수로 거류하였더니 거기에서 크고 강하고 번성한 민족이 되었는데

sentences.original_text: Then you shall declare before the Lord your God
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 너는 네 하나님 여호와 앞에서 선포하라

sentences.original_text: My father was a wandering Aramean
and he went down into Egypt
